de: Genießen Sie die Terrasse und die Räume, die Sie privatisieren können, um einen Moment mit Freunden oder der Familie in dieser außergewöhnlichen Umgebung zu verbringen.
en: The Base de Plein Air is situated at the Lac du Salagou which is a natural and protected site. This is a state-recognized Association with a great capacity of accommodation. Several recently-constructed buildings are available with all modern conveniences for groups and classes (with or without meals).
it: Venite a godervi la terrazza e le stanze che potete riservare per trascorrere del tempo con gli amici o la famiglia in questo ambiente eccezionale.
fr: Venez profiter de la terrasse et des salles que vous pouvez privatiser pour passer un moment entre amis ou en famille dans ce cadre exceptionnel.
es: Venga a disfrutar de la terraza y de las habitaciones que puede privatizar para pasar tiempo con los amigos o la familia en este entorno excepcional.
nl: Kom genieten van het terras en de kamers die u kunt privatiseren om tijd door te brengen met vrienden of familie in deze uitzonderlijke omgeving.

hasContact.schema:legalName: SALLE - BASE DE PLEIN AIR - DESTINATION SALAGOU

de: Genießen Sie die Terrasse und die Räume, die Sie privatisieren können, um einen Moment mit Freunden oder der Familie in dieser außergewöhnlichen Umgebung zu verbringen.
en: The Base de Plein Air is situated at the Lac du Salagou which is a natural and protected site. This is a state-recognized Association with a great capacity of accommodation. Several recently-constructed buildings are available with all modern conveniences for groups and classes (with or without meals). Customized holidays are available with nature and nautical activites, under the guidance of certified instructors. This service is also open to the general public. The Base rents nautical equipment, gives courses and individual instruction, looks after boats and does maintenance and repair.

nl: Kom genieten van het terras en de kamers die u kunt privatiseren om tijd door te brengen met vrienden of familie in deze uitzonderlijke omgeving.
